name: What Won't Eat You?
description:
A submission for the San Diego Game Jam by the 5-man Team Spaghetti.  This is a minified top-down souls-like game that was made in 48 hours. The theme of the game jam was: "If only we knew then, what we know now." The game is fairly short, but quite difficult. It takes some finesse to survive, and there's a lot of dirty tricks. Be prepared to have fun, get spooked, and probably die a lot!
